roleset.name: vaticinate
roleset.note: VATICINATE-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin. Member of Vncls conjecture-29.5-1. (from vaticinate.01-v)

example.name: Regular usage
example.text: Jim vaticinated on the shape of things to come.
example.arg: on the shape of things to come

example.name: with arg1
example.text: Economic analysts have vaticinated that these countries would be the engines for global growth in the next two decades.
example.arg: that these countries would be the engines for global growth in the next two decades
